description: Purchases a reserved DB instance offering.

parameters.name: ReservedDBInstancesOfferingId
parameters.description: The ID of the Reserved DB instance offering to purchase. Example: 438012d3-4052-4cc7-b2e3-8d3372e0e706

parameters.name: ReservedDBInstanceId
parameters.description: Customer-specified identifier to track this reservation. Example: myreservationID.

parameters.name: DBInstanceCount
parameters.description: The number of instances to reserve. Default: 1

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A list of tags. For more information, see Tagging Amazon RDS resources in the Amazon RDS User Guide or Tagging Amazon Aurora and Amazon RDS resources in the Amazon Aurora User Guide. (dict) --- Metadata assigned to an Amazon RDS resource consisting of a key-value pair. Key (string) --- A key is the required name of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --:', --/', --=', --+', ---', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$'). Value (string) --- A value is the optional value of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --:', --/', --=', --+', ---', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$').

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: A key is the required name of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --:', --/', --=', --+', ---', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$').

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: A value is the optional value of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --:', --/', --=', --+', ---', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$').

nested_items.name: ReservedDBInstance
nested_items.description: This data type is used as a response element in the DescribeReservedDBInstances and PurchaseReservedDBInstancesOffering actions.

nested_items.name: ReservedDBInstanceId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the reservation.

nested_items.name: DBInstanceClass
nested_items.description: The DB instance class for the reserved DB instance.

nested_items.name: Duration
nested_items.description: The duration of the reservation in seconds.

nested_items.name: FixedPrice
nested_items.description: The fixed price charged for this reserved DB instance.

nested_items.name: UsagePrice
nested_items.description: The hourly price charged for this reserved DB instance.

nested_items.name: CurrencyCode
nested_items.description: The currency code for the reserved DB instance.

nested_items.name: DBInstanceCount
nested_items.description: The number of reserved DB instances.

nested_items.name: ProductDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the reserved DB instance.

nested_items.name: OfferingType
nested_items.description: The offering type of this reserved DB instance.

nested_items.name: MultiAZ
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the reservation applies to Multi-AZ deployments.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the reserved DB instance.

nested_items.name: RecurringCharges
nested_items.description: The recurring price charged to run this reserved DB instance.

nested_items.name: RecurringChargeAmount
nested_items.description: The amount of the recurring charge.

nested_items.name: RecurringChargeFrequency
nested_items.description: The frequency of the recurring charge.

nested_items.name: ReservedDBInstanceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the reserved DB instance.

nested_items.name: LeaseId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the lease associated with the reserved DB instance.
